trans-unit.source: Add Push Notifications to iOS App with Azure Mobile Apps
trans-unit.target: Add Push Notifications to iOS App with Azure Mobile Apps

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Apps to send push notifications to your iOS app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Apps to send push notifications to your iOS app.

trans-unit.source: Add Push Notifications to your iOS App
trans-unit.target: Add Push Notifications to your iOS App

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you add push notifications to the [iOS quick start] project so that every time a record is inserted, a push notification is sent.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you add push notifications to the [iOS quick start] project so that every time a record is inserted, a push notification is sent.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is based on the [iOS quick start] tutorial, which you must complete first.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is based on the [iOS quick start] tutorial, which you must complete first.

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the downloaded quick start server project, you must add the push notification extension package to your project.
trans-unit.target: If you do not use the downloaded quick start server project, you must add the push notification extension package to your project.

trans-unit.source: For more information about server extension packages, see [Work with the .NET backend server SDK for Azure Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-server-sdk.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about server extension packages, see [Work with the .NET backend server SDK for Azure Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-server-sdk.md).

trans-unit.source: The [iOS simulator does not support push notifications](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/iOS_Simulator_Guide/TestingontheiOSSimulator.html), so for this tutorial, you need a physical iOS device and an [Apple Developer Program membership](https://developer.apple.com/programs/ios/).
trans-unit.target: The [iOS simulator does not support push notifications](https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/iOS_Simulator_Guide/TestingontheiOSSimulator.html), so for this tutorial, you need a physical iOS device and an [Apple Developer Program membership](https://developer.apple.com/programs/ios/).

trans-unit.source: Configure Azure to send push notifications
trans-unit.target: Configure Azure to send push notifications

trans-unit.source: Update server project to send push notifications
trans-unit.target: Update server project to send push notifications
